description:
The moment Sabrina Sparx arrives on set, her exuberant, loquacious and downright hyperactive personality begins to flood the room with cheer and giggles.
Not in any mood for cheer and with no use for giggles, cyd unceremoniously bends her over a bar, straps her down and shoves a cold steel hook up her ass. The rest of the shoot goes even harder for Sabrina. The hogtie she is put in is downright brutal, and it comes complemented with a tight face harness ball gag and a set of humiliating nose hooks. This shoot could alternatively be titled "Sabrina Sparx gets an attitude adjustment." When it's done, all the giggling has ceased.
title: Bend Over Bitch
